segment.source: How to download and use the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit to turn off the automatic delivery of IE11 through the Automatic Updates feature of Windows Update.
segment.target: How to download and use the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit to turn off the automatic delivery of IE11 through the Automatic Updates feature of Windows Update.

segment.source: What is the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit?
segment.target: What is the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit?

segment.source: (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: What is the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit?
segment.target: What is the Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit?

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: The Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit lets you turn off the automatic delivery of IE11 through the Automatic Updates feature of Windows Update.
segment.target: The Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit lets you turn off the automatic delivery of IE11 through the Automatic Updates feature of Windows Update.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The IE11 Blocker Toolkit doesn't stop users from manually installing IE11 from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: The IE11 Blocker Toolkit doesn't stop users from manually installing IE11 from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: Also, even if you've installed previous versions of the toolkit before, like for Internet Explorer 10, you still need to install this version to prevent the installation of IE11.
segment.target: Also, even if you've installed previous versions of the toolkit before, like for Internet Explorer 10, you still need to install this version to prevent the installation of IE11.

segment.source: To install the toolkit
segment.target: To install the toolkit

segment.source: Download the IE11 Blocker Toolkit from Toolkit to Disable Automatic Delivery of Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: Download the IE11 Blocker Toolkit from Toolkit to Disable Automatic Delivery of Internet Explorer 11.

segment.source: Accept the license agreement and store the included 4 files on your local computer.
segment.target: Accept the license agreement and store the included 4 files on your local computer.

segment.source: Start an elevated Command Prompt by going to StartAll ProgramsAccessories right-clicking on Command Prompt, and then choosing Run as Administrator.
segment.target: Start an elevated Command Prompt by going to StartAll ProgramsAccessories right-clicking on Command Prompt, and then choosing Run as Administrator.

segment.source: In the Command Prompt, change to the location where you put the 4 files.
segment.target: In the Command Prompt, change to the location where you put the 4 files.

segment.source: In the Command Prompt, type and press Enter.
segment.target: In the Command Prompt, type and press Enter.

segment.source: Wait for the message, Blocking deployment of IE11 on the local machine. The operation completed successfully.
segment.target: Wait for the message, Blocking deployment of IE11 on the local machine. The operation completed successfully.

segment.source: Close the Command Prompt.
segment.target: Close the Command Prompt.

segment.source: For answers to frequently asked questions, see Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit: Frequently Asked Questions.
segment.target: For answers to frequently asked questions, see Internet Explorer 11 Blocker Toolkit: Frequently Asked Questions.
